summary: A fading smalltime barber is forced to hire the last person on earth he'd want working in his shop - a woman.
cast: John Ratzenberger|Shelly Cole|Cindy Pickett|George McRae|Daron Jennings|Joshua Farrell|Cory DuVal|David Abad|Liz Anderson|Kevin Blackton|Chandler Bolt|Todd Aaron Brotze|Elwood Carlisle|Bettina Devin|Patrick Dreelan|Jessica Fields|Deb Fink|Mackenzie Firgens|Amos Glick|Cindy Goldfield|Meg Lee Ha|Luke Hoffman|Ed Holmes|Matt Johnson|Peter Judd|Michael Kasin|Aria London|Tom Luu|Amy Magyari|Heather Mathieson|Andre Mathieu|Don Morgan|Eli Nelson|Cam Newlin|Robert Anthony Peters|Peter Quartaroli|Jeffrey Rios|Michael X. Sommers|Daniel Souza|Bob Sáenz|Samantha Weaver|Laurellee Westaway|Chris Yule
title: The Village Barbershop
